title: Hewhay Hall
description: 2013 Epic Award Winner for Best HorrorAn unsung hero's destinyâ€”Slater's house of horrors.Fire-fighter Jude Elliott loses part of his leg trying to rescue a family held hostage during a terrorist attack. He journeys to mysterious Hewhey Hall, where it is told there are wondrous, magical cures. Little does Jude know that his destination is Slater The Prince of Envy's lair where demons reside and courageous souls are tormented... Can Jude escape Slater's house of horrors, or will he suffer for all of eternity?
author: Susan Roebuck
